website_summaries.verdict: A one-piece long hair extension that's ideal for adding length for special occasions.
pros: This one-piece wavy, synthetic hair extension is easy to attach to your own hair, thanks to the 5 clips that provide a secure fit
Earns praise for being soft and looking natural
cons: the choices don't provide a good match for everyone

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I would like it but I really did. For the price it's surprisingly nice. Not to thick that it's heavy to wear but thick enough to finally be able to bring my hair in front of my shoulders and still have plenty in the back. The clips hid well even in my fairly thin hair. It was not shiny and the strands of hair are very natural, not thick and coarse like some. I used it to thicken already long hair if your adding length to short hair I would recommend two. Auburn color was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great for Updos
customer_reviews.text: I have had all price range of hair extensions. This piece is a great price if you're looking to do a hairstyle where you need extra hair that cooperates and is easy to form. I am finally able to do all the Pinterest hairstyles I've pinned! Easy to straighten and curl as well, ive even washed them. This will not be my last purchase of these.
customer_reviews.author: BWhitley

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 Ash pink curly 24inch
customer_reviews.text: 2 sets are probably best for me, my young daughters only needed one as they have small heads and finer hair ( the clips make it feel heavy). The pink I bought is a nice dull tone, not neon pink or baby pink ( the small ash pink pic is pretty accurate unlike the larger double picture, on my screen), clips feel secure and the stitching looked good. They where fulfilled by amazon, Items came in a silver sealed bag I have a feeling we shall be buying more colors. ( I am glad I got myself a proper wig brush).
customer_reviews.author: Mystical shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product took longer than the delivery estimate but it was worth the wait. The seller was very patient. I wanted the product to add volume to my hair. I have been using it both when I braid my hair and when I leave it down. my hair normally tends to be silky and shiny. So this hair matches perfectly. The length of this is exactly the same length as my hair when I clip them ear to ear. I got natural black and it matches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: *ANGEL*

customer_reviews.title: It is really long but I love it! the color is an exact match to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really long but I love it! the color is an exact match to mine so I was very happy about that. I tangles easily but brushing it out helps a lot. So for so good and i intend on wearing it again. I originally bough it for an event and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Raina Easdale

customer_reviews.title: ... truly did not expect this product to be as good as it is
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 5 stars because I truly did not expect this product to be as good as it is. Color matched perfectly, easy to clip in. I cut it bc it was way to long for my hair. (That’s my fault for ordering the 24 inch). I’ve spent thousands of dollars on extensions. These in my opinion are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: I have long dark brown wavy hair that I wanted to make longer, and this worked SO PERFECTLY. I'm no expert, but I was able to figure out the clips, there weren't any that felt loose or looked like they were going to come off. But if they were, nothing a little thread and needle can't fix, that's a super easy repair. Anyway, this gave me the super long side braids I was hoping for. I just put a cute hat on to cover the extension lacing at the top of my head. Thinking about getting a second, slightly shorter version, so I can have layers and not such a large gap.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: I needed 2.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought every shade of red! So pretty and soft. I have short hair and just wear a hat so I need 2. They're thick but not that thick if your hair isn't long. They tangle within 3 days so you're gonna need synthetic wig spray. This time around I got the blood orange red bright color. Dark red. Not wine or ruby! Still think it's fabulous without dyeing and ruining my own hair. These R FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Andreasen

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect match to my hair color. It was light weight too so it didn’t feel heavy. It was a small/thin amount of hair so if you want a fuller look, this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice hair I bought 2 / straight 26" and it's too long I might have to cut it. And it's come in the packet. I have to hang it for a while. Anyway It's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost!😍💯
customer_reviews.text: Color wise they match almost perfectly wit my black hair. However if your hair isn’t the same density or cut as them, mine is thicker and less layered, they look less real. For the money tho👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼 Get these!! They have remained super soft and silky, if they tangle a little lightly brushing them solves that. Clips feel kinda heavy on the head over time, but that’s understandable. Especially if you got the long ones that’s a lotta hair weighing down lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Makk

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, go buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!! I ordered 26” and I’m very happy with my purchase. My natural hair is very long but very thin. I highly recommend this company! FYI: It can get tangled easily so that’s an only problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ruji

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed at how real it looked and felt. I was looking for something to make my hair look more fuller and this worked. I purchased the 24'/26' and my natural length is 20'. My friend said my hair looks so long and healthy she didn't even notice until i told her. It held up the whole night of me dancing til the morning. The only problem i had was when i took it off to put it away it took some time to brush out the knots. But that's understandable for synthetic hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am very amazing at the quality. It dont look silky like fake hair. I order red bc my hair is bright apple red i was worried it would be to bright but it is perfect. I would definitely order again if i needed too.
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Shipping and item as stated
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was great! I bought it for my Halloween costume . The hair it self, looked nice and long as stated. Only thing was that I couldn’t get one side to stay on. I ended up finding one that could. Could have been me putting it on wrong, but the other side stayed on well. Yes , I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: julie nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had them for a few months now and I just make sure to be careful with them and they’re still great!
customer_reviews.text: These hair extensions were surprisingly cute! I was a little hesitant at first because they were so cheap, but when I got them I was shocked! I had them cut by a friend so they weren’t so “perfect” looking, and they fit me so well. I’ve had them for a few months now and I just make sure to be careful with them and they’re still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: Thick hair and is very durable; does not break when you brush. However after time it will become course but with proper care you can avoid that.
customer_reviews.author: adrine

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. I mean for the price it isn't exactly shocking, but I literally cannot even get a brush through these. They feel so brittle and gross, like a cheap wig. The clips are not sewn in well, they will come loose and you will have to re-stitch the clips in IF you even wanted to wear them more than a couple times. I wear extensions everyday and for the price I thought I'd try it but I was disappointed. Will be tossing in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choose color carefully
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I ordered the wrong color though. I dye my hair black and i got soft black but I should’ve ordered the darker one. (Just a tip for anyone who dyes their hair black) so it’s hard to blend my hair with it & I have to use a filter to make it match and spend forever trying to blend it. I just wish the piece was longer so it could reach both ends of my head and look more natural,
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these extensions, they are SUPER long. Everyone thought it was my real hair. Probably some of the best extensions I’ve ever bought. I got the 29” curly in dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chuah

customer_reviews.title: but the quality wasn’t like the ones I bought at Sally’s beauty supply
customer_reviews.text: This definitely gets the job done, but the quality wasn’t like the ones I bought at Sally’s beauty supply. It washed well, but conditioner and detangler while wet is a MUST! I suggest using a wet brush when combing thru conditioner. Dried back to original shape. Would suggest this if you can’t afford anything higher end.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for you have to at least buy 3 of this extension to make it blend but they mess up really fast so it was a waist of money
customer_reviews.author: monica s.

customer_reviews.title: Buy but only short term use
customer_reviews.text: Hair was super long and semi wavy, but with synthetic it means tangles and coarse hair. That’s exactly what this hair is! Great for single day events but not long term extensions. I’d say buy it if you want something long 24’ and SHORT TERM but don’t if you expect it to last .
customer_reviews.author: Inglish

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly thick. I actually have two in, and the curls where beautiful! I would cut to make it look like it blends in. Heavy too!
customer_reviews.author: Kendrah

customer_reviews.title: The clips hurt
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but it's literally just one strip of hair that tangles every time you move
customer_reviews.author: Emina Lukac

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and it did the job but I will probably never wear again. It looks fake and plasticy and tangles VERY easy. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: felt nice and wasn’t stiff or too fake looking , just too heavy for my head , also the flat iron fries it so if you use it to get the kinks out use a low heat and go in quick strokes .
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Good length, quality is poor (looks cheap) but  expected for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good length, quality is poor (looks cheap) but expected for the price! It Ifade in with your natural hair if your hair is long enough so that’s good!
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: WORST HAIR PIECE EVER
customer_reviews.text: WORST HAIR PIECE EVER. EVEN THOUGH THEY GIVE YOU EXTRA CLIPS, THE CLIPS SEWN INTO THE HAIR FALL OUT AFTER A FEW WEARS. THE HAIR LOOKS LIKE A MASSIVE RATS NEST AFTER WEARING IT. JUST STEER CLEAR OF THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: CHASITY LYNN

customer_reviews.title: The hair is surprisingly good quality. The bad
customer_reviews.text: I was Cruella deville and used this for half of my head. The hair is surprisingly good quality. The bad, it's just the one track you see so if you are looking for actual fullness to your natural hair color, order at least 2. But price wise, still very cheap and good quality. Would recommend. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Vielmas

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Very cute I wore them for a while I bought two though to make it look more natural but the curls did come undone after a week or so and they get tangled super easily
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Color matched and they look great.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations...ended up buying (2) since I have a lot more hair. Color matched and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Arias

customer_reviews.title: But does have the length and color ia pretty apot on
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried them on yet, but not as curly as it shows in photos. But does have the length and color ia pretty apot on, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: morgan08

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!! Can not believe how cheap this is!!! Looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena P.

customer_reviews.title: You need more than one piece
customer_reviews.text: The quality is amazing for the price!!!! I would order more than 1 piece though. It’s amazing!!! My hair is so long now!!!! 😻😻🦄😻🦄😻
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: I ordered another
customer_reviews.text: really easy tp put on..I am new to this but I love it very impressed for such a great price I ordered another
customer_reviews.author: angelboomjune

customer_reviews.title: Looked good the first rime
customer_reviews.text: It looked good the first day then goat pretty nasty, frizzy and super tangled. Combing it ripped the hair out. I have pretty curly frizzy hair already so I still use it but I braid it in togeather
customer_reviews.author: Camomoma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't reach all the way around (maybe I have a larger than average head🤷🏻‍♀️) but it did the job
customer_reviews.author: tamecia

customer_reviews.title: Okay for costume use only
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality , heavy. Okay for Halloween or cosplay use only.
customer_reviews.author: RN24/7

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! Matches my hair color and are Easy to put in your hair. I had people come up to me and see your hair is beautiful and so is the color!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: honestly, i did not have high expectations about this but it turns out that these hair extensions look so natural and beautiful ! I love the color and texture! definitely happy that i ordered this :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look real, but otherwise fine
customer_reviews.text: This was great to lengthen my hair, but you can tell these are extensions. Since it’s just a single piece, there’s a cutoff line between your real and fake hair. The hair is also synthetic, so it tangled easy and you can’t style it with heat.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Cute..but tangled easily..brushes out curl very easily..also very heavy ..not very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Zyanya owens

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not full enough for a one piece. Curls came out quickly
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Essaidi

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and blends well!
customer_reviews.text: It blends in with my natural hair so well! Basically people can’t even tell I’m wearing extensions even when they touch them :) also works fine with low heat! I’ll definitely order some more colors/ lengths!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were really heavy and I had a really difficult time getting them to stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: your head literally looks deform once you clip in the hair extension
customer_reviews.author: Latania Tsinajinnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice hair
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need more than one! One isn't enough to cover and look natural. The hair looks gorgeous and felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Becky smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's excelent! lot of hair, very good quality, good clips!
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA S.

customer_reviews.title: One is good TWO is Great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the color but it is fine. I bought two hair pieces. At this price you can always have a spare or do like I do I like both together.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Clips rip out hair and gives a headache. Also they look EXTREMELY fake, the shininess is party City quality. Save your money girls and boys, this sucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected! The curls are nice and it's easy to clip onto my hair. It matches my hair color perfectly and really blends in. Cant wait to wear it for a wedding I'm attending.
customer_reviews.author: Mystique

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. Rarely does the photo do the product justice! I ordered two sets. The hair comes long and thick, so you can cut it to your liking. The color is nearly the perfect shade; matches my very white hair just right without looking fake. I love wearing the hair in a messy up-do or ponytail, but it looks great down, too. The clips are strong and easy to place. There's minimal shedding, and it's overall just gorgeous waves! Also came packaged very nicely and arrived in a week! Will definitely be buying again. For the price, it's pretty unbelievable. :)
customer_reviews.author: 😻

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft and realist the hair is! Kinda disappointed because it was fairly thin, i had to buy an extra one to match my thick hair. The color was a bit too dark for me but its barely noticeable. Totally love it!
customer_reviews.author: Martha N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are ok look sorta real but it sheds alot
customer_reviews.author: Madison R

customer_reviews.title: Knots very easy but great value for $$ have to be very ...
customer_reviews.text: Knots very easy but great value for $$ have to be very gentle with it. Good for a one or two times use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Color and Quality Feel
customer_reviews.text: It took me a bit to figure out the snaps so I actually broke one by accident. Otherwise it was very easy to clip into my hair. I suggest buying two or more so you can layer them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Super nice feels like real hair! And can use heat products I cutt it to my length and I love it !
customer_reviews.author: katerina k.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste money on this product! Its so cheap and thin! Only gave it one star because I cant give it zero starts!!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price! They are somewhat heavy but not significantly. While synthetic they are natural looking. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These matched my hair color exactly which was my biggest worry! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Very soft, no tangles, curly, 24 inches, nice steely shade of grey. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Not good hair
customer_reviews.text: The hair was not as the photos shown the hair is tangley
customer_reviews.author: Chiffon WilliamsBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very soft...real hair...easy to manage...love it But thin...would need 2 if u have thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Reena Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little dark than I expected but I love them
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy Huminski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super quick shipping!! Hair is long and soft and shiney! Perfect black to match my hair! And the curls are great! Clips are nice and steardy and hold well in the hair! Would def buy from this seller again they are a good deal for the quality you get!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Clips, Stays Put!
customer_reviews.text: Clips in very easily and seller worked with me to make the product worth having!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t purchase it
customer_reviews.text: It’s only for one time wear not more and it looks 100% fake
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: Made for small heads lol
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be wider so I got 2 it’s strange
customer_reviews.author: holly montez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly. The price and quality was acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gant

customer_reviews.title: I loved them I boutique two of them dark brown and ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved them I boutique two of them dark brown and blonde ash. They look super real btw !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT OVER BRUSH. Will tangle when wearing all day.
customer_reviews.text: Love love!! Perfect for quick beautiful extensions!! Have recommended to other people who have purchased! DO NOT OVER BRUSH! Will tangle when worn for long period of time such as a full day . But looks natural!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair was nice!
customer_reviews.text: The hair was nice, just didn't match because I bought the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the thickness and quality. Great price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: really good quality hair and it matches perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came very fast ., really good quality hair and it matches perfect ., it's just a little longer than I expected but I really do love it
customer_reviews.author: Deb T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and quality is good, surprisingly didn’t tangle much at all
customer_reviews.text: Fits good and quality is good, surprisingly didn’t tangle much at all
customer_reviews.author: lucretia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great, they work well for starters or if you’re just going out for an occasion. Have no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and fast seller. Hair is full and looks almost like human hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love these extensions. I order the curly ones and straighten them. I will keep on ordering them because the shipping is fast and their good quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Snarls and wears out easily but looks great short term
customer_reviews.author: Destany Rolfson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product... only get maybe 5 good uses from it, but can still put in and pull hair back and looks fine...We'll worth the money and get free shipping... Overall, A....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the length was great and the curls were gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: It was more than i expected! the length was great and the curls were gorgeous! the only slightly negative thing ihave to say is that its too shiny but it is synthetic so its understandable :D
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!! Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Great for the price!!! I bought the 17" n they layer nicely!! I'm in love Not super shiny
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey  Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my costume!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to clip into my short hair. I bought it for a princess jasmine costume, and it worked great. I just clipped it to one side of my head for a ponytail, and it looked awesome. If you were planning on wearing it down, I would get two - they're a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: jcqln

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the package the color was right on, it looked so nice and it felt smooth too, I showed my mom and she couldn't believe how nice it looked. Definitely going to be ordering this hair piece again
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and thick
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and thick, I got them 6 days early! Best deal on extensions I've ever seen. I never wright reviews but I had to on this one. Its just to good to be true honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: their great for the price but they tangle too much but I liked them and they are thick .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of hair for such a low price ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of hair for such a low price. It does shed a lot but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! They came quickly and are exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this specific color to someone who has more orange ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair color is a level 6R warm ginger/auburn and this color matches almost perfectly with my hair. I do not recommend this specific color to someone who has more orange or brown undertones though, as it is a true "red." The quality of the hair is silky smooth and has retained the curls. However, it does not brush easily. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Glorioso

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: This color is not the same as pictured. I wanted true red and this was like a burgundy (almost like I could get out of a box dye). Not at all what I wanted. It was a nice piece and would work great but when trying to semi-match my comic-book-red hair it was not good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel-Rose W. Taubler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it love the price even better and I'm going to get another one in the straight hair
customer_reviews.author: samantha jo cleary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fun for an evening out!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear for fun and for going out and am very pleased with them. I bought 2 because I have very thick hair and this was a good decision for me. The hair is silky and shiny and the clips are sturdy and well placed. The auburn matched my hair color very well. I am thinking of trying some hair chalk or koolaid on the blond ends. Very good price for a fun hair piece and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The hair is beautiful but way to thick and heavy for me. My hair is so fine and minute this doesn't blend at all with my sad hair. I can't clip this to my weak hair, it is way too heavy for it. It's obvious it's not my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Worst I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Tangled as soon as I took it out and once you get rid of 1 there's always another. Worst I ever bought. You get what you pay for. Put it right in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ffdemt114

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This was my first pair of extensions, I just wanted them to experiment with. They match my hair color perfectly and they're really simple to put in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of my money love the color that is only thing i liked

customer_reviews.title: i don't like!
customer_reviews.text: i thought it going to be less fake, but it is total F A K E, i don't like!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Too light for my hair. I purchased five separate ...
customer_reviews.text: Too light for my hair. I purchased five separate pieces and returned them around Christmas because I couldn't wear them for the holiday. When I called they had no returns or refunds posted yet...help. aprox $50 plus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Abysmal quality. Looked fake and even with two pieces, it wasn't thick enough to blend in with my real hair.

product_meta.title: S-noilite 24"/26" Straight Curly 3/4 Full Head One Piece 5clips Clip in Hair Extensions Long Poplar Style for Xmas Gifts 22colors (24" - Curly, natural black)
